body:
Implementation completed! Here's a summary of the work done:

### Profile Page Updates

✅ Component Integration:
- Added TenantStatus component
- Added MyProjects component
- Added RedeemInvite component

✅ Layout Structure:
```tsx
<Container size="md" py="xl">
  {/* User Profile Section */}
  <Paper shadow="sm" p="xl" radius="md" mb="xl">
    {/* User info... */}
  </Paper>

  {/* Workspace Section */}
  <Stack spacing="xl">
    <TenantStatus />
    <MyProjects />
    <RedeemInvite />
  </Stack>
</Container>
```

✅ Dependencies:
- Added QueryClientProvider for data fetching
- Configured QueryClient instance
- Imported all required components

✅ Layout Features:
- Vertical stack layout for workspace components
- Proper spacing between sections
- Clean separation of profile and workspace areas
- Consistent padding and margins

✅ Visibility Logic:
- TenantStatus shows create form only when no tenant exists
- MyProjects and RedeemInvite are always visible
- Loading states handled by each component

✅ Console Logging:
- All component logs are visible in the browser console
- Each component handles its own error logging
- Success states are properly logged

### Testing
Verified the following scenarios:
1. Initial load with loading states
2. Authenticated vs unauthenticated states
3. Tenant exists vs no tenant
4. Projects list empty vs with projects
5. Invite redemption flow

### Code Location
Updated `/client/src/pages/Profile.tsx` with all Phase 1 components integrated.

All requirements have been met and the profile page is ready for testing.
